channel.title: controversies on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in controversies on FinanClub

item.title: PBR-A
item.description: score:58 Chances: Expectation of another 40 years of oil production. Successful start of operations for the second FPSO at Campos Basin. Petrobras rebalancing with market through fuel price hikes. Positive investment plans in the new 5-year plan. Initiation of service contracts and radio links for offshore units.
